home.title: Chorder
home.subtitle: The ultimate music tool
options.title: Options
instrument.title: Instrument
name: Name
infoModal.what-chordmaker: Chordmaker is a free chord encyclopedia where you can search for chords.
infoModal.usage2-chordmaker: To search for a chord, select the tiles with your notes and Chordmaker will provide you the chord given from all the possible notes combination.
infoModal.usage4-chordmaker: If a chord is displayed, click on his name to see all of his traits
infoModal.usage6-chordmaker: Click on the buttons to listen to che chord, or to an arpeggio of the chord (you can always change the instrument in the options).
infoModal.what-notefinder: Notefinder is a free chord encyclopedia where you can find the notes of every chord.
infoModal.usage2-notefinder: To search for a chord, select the Tonic or first note of your chord, then you can either use the filters or the seachbar.
infoModal.usage4-notefinder: If a chord is displayed, click on his name to see the notes and all of his traits
infoModal.usage6-notefinder: Click on the buttons to listen to che chord, or to an arpeggio of the chord (you can always change the instrument in the options).
